fn cmp<T: PartialOrd>(a: &Option<T>, b: &Option<T>) -> Ordering {
23
    // None is high
24
0
    match (a, b) {
25
0
        (None, None) => Ordering::Equal,
26
0
        (None, Some(_)) => Ordering::Greater,
27
0
        (Some(_), None) => Ordering::Less,
28
0
        (Some(a), Some(b)) => a.partial_cmp(b).unwrap(),
29
    }
30
0
}
